BEFORE:
x = self.pool(self.conv1(x))
        x = self.pool(self.conv2(x))
        x = x.view(x.shape[0], -1)
        x = self.relu(self.fc1(x))
AFTER:
x = self.flatten(x)

        x = self.fc1(x)
        x = self.activation(x)

        x = self.fc2(x)
        x = self.activation(x)

        x = self.fc3(x)
        x = self.activation(x)
